metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17042 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: lib/yard/core_ext/file.rb in the server in YARD before 0.9.11 does notblock relative paths with an initial ../ sequence, which allows attackersto conduct directory traversal attacks and read arbitrary files.

criterions.comment: yard: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
